text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia pachyaxon is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.  Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Manzanares, J.M. & Pitman, N. (2003). "Tillandsia pachyaxon". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2003: e.T43341A10798321. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2003.RLTS.T43341A10798321.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
